title: Nijigaku’s Live: Day 2!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Emma-saaaan~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>*Huff*, *huff*.... Maru made it zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What’s the hurry? Here, wipe off your sweat with this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you zura.... No, wait! Maru brought you some refreshments, Emma-san! You gave us some refreshments when we were practicing before, right? So Maru was thinking of repaying that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? You really don’t have to.... But, I’m happy! Thank you, Hanamaru-chan. May I open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>By all means zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>....Waaaaaaaah! Sandwiches~~~~!! Can I really have these?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! Maru heard that you like bread, Emma-san, so. Lives must make you hungry, right? So when you do get hungry, eat it, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thank you~~!! Huuug~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
